# 推荐系统调研报告及综述（张永锋）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tuijian-xitong-diaoyan-baogao-ji-zongshu-zhangyongfeng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tuijian-xitong-diaoyan-baogao-ji-zongshu-zhangyongfeng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tuijian-xitong-diaoyan-baogao-ji-zongshu-zhangyongfeng
tuijian-xitong-diaoyan-baogao-ji-zongshu-zhangyongfeng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tuijian-xitong-diaoyan-baogao-ji-zongshu-zhangyongfeng
tuijian-xitong-diaoyan-baogao-ji-zongshu-zhangyongfeng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
